it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.controller.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    The class of the controller, receives commands from the games manager and modifies the state of the model, or queries it for informations to share over the network
    Author:
    GerlandoSavio

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public boolean execute(Action action)
        The controller gets the Action from the client view and executes it if it is contained in the set of currently available actions that are defined in the current controller State. Then, if the action successes we change state of our finite state automata.
        Parameters:
        action - the Action class implementation on which we call the execute method
        Returns:
        boolean with the outcome

      • parseAction

        public boolean parseAction(java.lang.String actionName,
                  java.lang.String parameters)
        translates the request message into an action. The return generates a response to send to the client.
        Parameters:
        actionName -
        parameters - string with optional parameters, like a coordinate in string form.
        Returns:
        outcome of the execute method

      • computeQuery

        public ResponseMessage computeQuery(java.util.UUID clientId,
                           java.lang.String queryType)
        Queries the model for specific informations
        Parameters:
        clientId - the sender of the query
        queryType - the string with which we distinguish the query
        Returns:
        ResponseMessage with a boolean and a string if necessary
